review.title: “Not a bad place to work.”
review.pros: Pros – Good technology and lot of products manufactured and maintained. Stable and diverse level product line. Challenging environment with pressure sometimes to complete tasks.
review.cons: Cons – No long term vision and luck of planning. Poor communication between departments. No staff development policy in place and no plans for future implementation.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Improve communication between departments. Let staff know about the future plans and allow them to really participate - helps with motivation. Implement staff development policy.
